mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, user_email AS email, user_tel AS phone, user_age AS age, user_name AS name, user_role AS grade FROM normal_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT r.reservation_id AS resvId, d.title AS storeName, r.reservation_date AS resvDate, r.reservation_time AS resvTime, r.count_people AS headCount, r.reservation_state AS status, IF(rv.review_idx IS NULL, 0, 1) AS isReviewed FROM reservation r JOIN restaurant_detail d ON r.restaurant_id = d.restaurant_id LEFT JOIN review rv ON r.reservation_id = rv.reservation_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.reservation_date DESC
